Sequence Information.Target Organism: Human lymphoma cell line U-937 GTB (IC50=1.6 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.18191970] Cytotoxicity:Human lymphoma cell line U-937 GTB (IC50=1.6 µM).
Sequence Information.Structure Description: The cyclotides are head-to-tail macrocyclic and they have three disulfides arranged in a cystine knot, in which two disulfide bonds and their connecting backbone segments form an embedded ring that is penetrated by the third disulfide bond. Cyclotides exhibit a broad range of biological effects, including insecticidal, haemolytic, and cytotoxic effects.
Sequence Information.Function: Probably participates in a plant defense mechanism. Has cytotoxic activity.
Sequence Information.PTM: Contains three disulfide bonds 5-21; 9-23; 14-28. This is a cyclic peptide (cross-link at G1-N31).

Literature.Title: The alpine violet, Viola biflora, is a rich source of cyclotides with potent cytotoxicity.
Literature.Author: Herrmann A, Burman R, Mylne JS, Karlsson G, Gullbo J, Craik DJ, Clark RJ, Göransson U.
